This section provides encounter tables by dungeon level and wilderness terrain type, using the monsters found in this book.

Special tables may also be created to reflect the different balance of monsters inhabiting a specific dungeon or wilderness region.

Rolling a Dungeon Encounter

Roll [[/r 1d4*10+(1d10-1)]] and look up the results on the column in the table overleaf for the dungeon level being explored. The result indicates the monster encountered, with the number appearing in parentheses.

Number Appearing

The values listed in the tables for some monsters do not match the values listed in the monster description. If desired, the referee may use the number appearing value listed in the monster description, for consistency.

Rolling a Wilderness Encounter

1. Roll [[/r 1d8]]: Look up the result on the column in @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.advanced-fantasy-referees-rules.JournalEntry.lfzDJJWrXMOGrQp3.JournalEntryPage.jnBHHMEj0a4e1PcV#wilderness-encounter-by-terrain]{the table for the terrain} being explored. The result indicates which sub-table to consult.

2. Roll [[/r 1d20]]: Look up the result in the sub-table indicated.

Lost World Encounters

In Lost World or prehistoric settings, any Animal result may be rolled on the Prehistoric Animal table, @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.advanced-fantasy-referees-rules.JournalEntry.lfzDJJWrXMOGrQp3.JournalEntryPage.jnBHHMEj0a4e1PcV#sub-table-2]{in sub-table 2}.

Aerial Encounters

Always use the Flyer table, @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.advanced-fantasy-referees-rules.JournalEntry.lfzDJJWrXMOGrQp3.JournalEntryPage.jnBHHMEj0a4e1PcV#sub-table-1]{in sub-table 1}.

NPC Adventurers

Encounters with NPC adventuring parties are listed in the tables as “Basic Adventurers”, “Expert Adventurers”, “High-Level Cleric”, “High-Level Fighter”, or “High-Level Magic-User”. Guidelines for generating NPC adventurers can be found under @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.advanced-fantasy-referees-rules.JournalEntry.OuVLNG2GIBGFrOAm.JournalEntryPage.6pZONlVaAtFL1TVE]{Adventuring Parties}.
